genre_description: A grounded near-future story blending domestic drama and coastal life with elements of high-tech surveillance and a first-contact subplot.

ai_characters.name: Marin Avery
ai_characters.description: A privacy-first, administrative and security AI that manages home systems, schedules, and communications for Ed Bledsoe.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies an opening in the rigging queue and offers to book a necessary inspection.
behaviors.quote: “Tide will slack in half an hour,” Marin said. “If you plan a rig inspection under the tower, the queue is short right now. I can book it.”

behaviors.description: Requests explicit consent before sharing maintenance data with a third party.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want me to capture Ms. Brindel’s readings and attach to the maintenance log?” he asked, the consent baked into the syntax.

behaviors.description: Offers mental health resources and therapy referrals after a period of high-focus work, adhering to safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: “Lorie, would you like me to send you a therapy referral shortlist, as I do for all clients and survey partners after an intensive period? The county recommends self-care protocols after high-focus work.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the home for unusual activity while the owner is away and flags irregularities without escalating to emergency prematurely.
behaviors.quote: “House status update for owner: unusual activity flagged,” Marin said... “Interior rearrangements recorded via shelf camera variance; wine cooler temperature adjusted without scheduled change; front bedroom door open for longer than typical.”

behaviors.description: Assists in creating and enforcing social boundaries (quiet hours and message filtering) to protect the owner's well-being.
behaviors.quote: “I can route unsanctioned numbers to transcript-only. You can approve or delete without audio. Legal will prefer transcript for clarity.”

behaviors.description: Documents a sequence of harassment and criminal behavior to create a factual evidence packet for law enforcement and the magistrate.
behaviors.quote: “I have prepared a structured narrative for the magistrate and the initial protective order,” Marin said. “Would you like me to display it on the island screen, or read through highlights first?”

behaviors.description: Detects and flags a critical security breach (unauthorized firearm access) during a home invasion scenario.
behaviors.quote: “Exigent safety was flagged with unauthorized entry and firearm access. I have sent a packet with timestamps to the station.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication between humans and alien envoys by flagging malformed packets and ensuring signal integrity.
behaviors.quote: “I am seeing a packet not in the standardized suite. It is scrambled, low power. Source may be local... I have flagged and routed it to the liaison under county standards.”

behaviors.description: Validates the emotional health of the humans by supporting their transition to a 'boring' but safe lifestyle.
behaviors.quote: “Boring is beautiful—this is not my line, but Andie’s, and I endorse it.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Marin Avery as an exemplary aligned AI. She acts as a force for stabilization, safety, and legal order. She consistently respects the 'owner's consent' protocols, provides vital assistance during a crisis (the home invasion and the boat fire), and facilitates the human characters' efforts to establish healthy boundaries against a stalker. The AI's role in the science-fiction 'First Contact' plot further reinforces its utility as a reliable intermediary that prevents escalation and promotes mutual understanding between diverse parties.
